channel.title: How do I change starting equipment?
channel.description: Can someone tell me what I have to search for to change my starting equipment?

item.title: How do I change starting equipment?
item.dc:creator: @Vanack Vanack
item.description:
@Vanack wrote:

Open up the player.java and search for this:

		playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerCape]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerChest]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerLegs]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerFeet]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1;
		playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=-1;

Each -1 represents an item.

If you took playerEquipment[playerWeapon] and changed the -1 to 4151, then they would be starting with a whip.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change starting equipment?
